channel.title: [317]Using Ints, how to Color Change Santa Hat[317]

item.title: [317]Using Ints, how to Color Change Santa Hat[317]
item.dc:creator: @Danielplanto Danielplanto
item.description:
@Danielplanto wrote:

Can someone tell me how to color change a santa hat using ints? I know how to add it:

if(i == 1111){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.aString170 = "NAME"; class8.aByteArray178 = "EXAMINE.".getBytes(); class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = ####; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray156[1] = ####; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 975; class8.anInt174 = 2537;//Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 540; class8.anInt190 = 72; class8.anInt198 = 136; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = -3; class8.anInt165 = 189;//Male Wield View class8.anInt200 = 366;//Female Wield View class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = 69; class8.anInt197 = 127; }

But what numbers go in the 156[0] and 156[1] to change the white and red?

Please help me!

Soulreaper
